markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Sturdy Satchel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=850)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 34</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Players can gain access to faction-specific gear by taking the corresponding Faction Gear Access Game Reward, available when they reach 20 reputation with the respective faction._

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This heavy [backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4) of alchemically treated cloth layered over a metal mesh protects its contents from water damage and other harmful effects. It holds up to 4 Bulk of items, and the first 2 Bulk contained within the sturdy satchel do not count against your Bulk limits. The bag has Hardness 5 and 20 Hit Points. As long as the bag remains closed and is not broken, water and other liquids can't seep into it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sturdy Satchel
